item.title: Courting - Lika Star, Manuel Ferrara
item.description: How do you get a seat at the table with a high-powered bombshell like Lika? Do you woo her with gifts and bend over backward, or get right to the point? Lika plays hardball and prefers it rough and dirty.
item.content:encoded: How do you get a seat at the table with a high-powered bombshell like Lika? Do you woo her with gifts and bend over backward, or get right to the point? Lika plays hardball and prefers it rough and dirty.

item.title: No Regrets - Nancy Ace, Martin X
item.description: Nancy is in Paris for an internship at a museum. While there, she met Martin, a young artist. She fell hard for him, but he only made a move the last few days before she was leaving. Every since they have been inseparable. She finally gets taken back to his place, and he surprises her with the view. He is so taken back, she kisses him right away. They have sex all night but it’s still not enough. Nancy wants to give him something he will always remember.
item.content:encoded: Nancy is in Paris for an internship at a museum. While there, she met Martin, a young artist. She fell hard for him, but he only made a move the last few days before she was leaving. Every since they have been inseparable. Nancy wants to give him something he will always remember.

item.title: After Dark Part 4 - Tori Black, Markus Dupree
item.description: After her voyeuristic experience by the pool, Tori makes her way to the bedroom to give a rude awakening. They only have a short time together and she has the perfect going away present for him. Like the rest of her life, she is always intent on getting whatever she wants - and this is no exception.
item.content:encoded: After her voyeuristic experience by the pool, Tori makes her way to the bedroom to give a rude awakening. They only have a short time together and she has the perfect going away present for him. Like the rest of her life, she is always intent on getting whatever she wants - and this is no exception.

item.title: Exhibitionist - Tiffany Tatum, Christian Clay
item.description: For a long time, Tiffany couldn't understand why girls dated older men. That was until now. After meeting her latest man on a trip to Europe, she has become just like him - an exhibitionist, and it doesn't matter where they may be - if he wants her, he takes her. It is the week before Tiffany goes back to college, and he has taken her to an amazing hotel. He is going to make sure this girl will never ever forget the experiences she has had with him.
item.content:encoded: For a long time, Tiffany couldn't understand why girls dated older men. That was until now. After meeting her latest man on a trip to Europe, she has become just like him - an exhibitionist, and it doesn't matter where they may be - if he wants her, he takes her. It is the week before Tiffany goes back to college, and he has taken her to an amazing hotel. He is going to make sure this girl will never ever forget the experiences she has had with him.

item.title: Last Minute Fun - Adriana Chechik, Manuel Ferrara
item.description: For the last year, Adriana has been working as an Executive Assistant, working many late nights for a boss who is very demanding. When he asks her to be a business date, she is thrilled and she was very excited about getting to know him a little better. She has an amazing time and she really doesn't want it to end. When he offers her some time off for her help, she lets him know, she really wants to continue their fun, and he is happy to do so. She is about to get exactly what she has been craving since the day she got the job.
item.content:encoded: For the last year, Adriana has been working as an Executive Assistant, working many late nights for a boss who is very demanding. When he asks her to be a business date, she is thrilled and she was very excited about getting to know him a little better. She has an amazing time and she really doesn't want it to end. When he offers her some time off for her help, she lets him know, she really wants to continue their fun, and he is happy to do so. She is about to get exactly what she has been craving since the day she got the job.

item.title: Hot For TA, Too - Megan Rain, Xander Corvus
item.description: Megan is getting suspicious about her roommates grades picking up, bearing in mind she never stops partying and she didn't start studying either, she is managing to ace this trimester. When she asks her what her secret is, her roommate lets on about her affair with their TA, and Megan decides she wants in on the action too. When Megan meets up for him for their next lesson, she gets straight to work ensuring that she gets the same arrangement for the rest of the term - with an added bonus.
item.content:encoded: Megan is getting suspicious about her roommates grades picking up, bearing in mind she never stops partying and she didn't start studying either, she is managing to ace this trimester. When Megan meets up for him for their next lesson, she gets straight to work ensuring that she gets the same arrangement for the rest of the term - with an added bonus.

item.title: Way Better Than Your Wife - Angel Smalls, Mick Blue
item.description: For as long as she can remember, Angel has always been attracted to her dad's best friend. One weekend, he is staying at their house because he is having issues with his wife. This is the perfect opportunity for her to be alone with him while her dad is at work and live out one of her fantasies. She offers herself to him on a plate, and he doesn't take much persuading to give in to what she has in mind. Her fantasy is about to become a reality and make sure he forgets all his troubles at home.
item.content:encoded: For as long as she can remember, Angel has always been attracted to her dad's best friend. One weekend, he is staying at their house because he is having issues with his wife. This is the perfect opportunity for her to be alone with him while her dad is at work and live out one of her fantasies. She offers herself to him on a plate, and he doesn't take much persuading to give in to what she has in mind. Her fantasy is about to become a reality and make sure he forgets all his troubles at home.

item.title: Almost Caught - Keisha Grey, Jean Val Jean
item.description: Keisha has been living with her best friend Jenny for a few years. They met at college and have been close ever since. What she doesn't know is that Keisha has been sleeping with her boyfriend for the last few weeks. Hooking up whenever Jenny is at work, Keisha knows its wrong, and there has been a really near miss recently when Jenny came back unexpectedly. Almost getting caught has made Keisha even more determined to continue this forbidden affair.
item.content:encoded: Keisha has been living with her best friend Jenny for a few years. They met at college and have been close ever since. What she doesn't know is that Keisha has been sleeping with her boyfriend for the last few weeks. Hooking up whenever Jenny is at work, Keisha knows its wrong, and there has been a really near miss recently when Jenny came back unexpectedly. Almost getting caught has made Keisha even more determined to continue this forbidden affair.

item.title: The Girlfriend Experience Part 2 - Anya Olsen, Christian Clay
item.description: The lovely Anya. A sexy student who is struggling to make ends meet. When she moves in with her school friend Bree to share the rent, Bree begins to meet up with a sexy European guy who has money, looks and loves a younger woman. When Bree tells Anya that her sugar daddy would love to meet up with her, at first she is a little apprehensive, but she knows that if she wants her money troubles gone, she has to take this opportunity. All she needs to do is be a good little girl and grant his every wish.
item.content:encoded: The lovely Anya. A sexy student who is struggling to make ends meet. When she moves in with her school friend Bree to share the rent, Bree begins to meet up with a sexy European guy who has money, looks and loves a younger woman. All she needs to do is be a good little girl and grant his every wish.

item.title: Working It - Leah Gotti, Christian Clay
item.description: Stunning Leah. A beautiful girl who has had to get a part time job to help pay her college fees and bills. She babysits for a wealthy European man who pays her well, and makes no secret of the fact that he really likes her too. When his wife isn’t home, he is always tipping her well for all her hard work. When all her chores are done, she loves nothing more than to skinny dip in his huge pool. One day he comes back unannounced, seeing a lot more than he expected. He wraps a towel around her and cannot resist caressing her body. Leah is about to embark on the biggest bonus she’s had so far.
